item.title: Welcome
item.description: What are you looking for? What challenges do you face? What are institutional challenges Background and experience From the pre-workshop survey Institution type 8 / 19 Two-year college 12 / 19 Four year institution Grad-school discipline 18 / 19 Mathematics (and maybe it’s 19 / 19) 2 / 19 Computer science 2 / 19 Engineering Statistics experience 3 / 19 studied applied statistics in grad school 2 / 18 studied theoretical statistics in grad school 7 / 18 do applied statistics outside of teaching Teaching experience: number with > 2 years experience 15 / 16 “other” mathematics (1 has no experience) 14 / 19 calculus (1 has no experience) 10 / 19 college algebra (4 have no experienceª) 7 / 19 intro stat 3 / 16 computer science (12 have no experience) 3 / 18 statistics (7 have no experience) ✽ Might these be 4-year instructors at institutions without a college algebra course?
